description:
Barcelona is where the fated final battle will take place. Sightseeing during their free time, Victor is oblivious to Yuri`s resolve. Then, a chance remark reveals a nightmarish event at the banquet last year for Yuri...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chou Ganbaranba! Grand Prix Final Chouzen Special
Gotta Supercharge It!! Pre-Grand Prix Final Special!
超がんばらんば! グランプリファイナル直前スペシャル
